sys_script_include.description: Set Lead Time to set when needed date based on Request type hr, facility, legal
sys_script_include.name: NeeditLeadTimeSet

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_11c86a589761211081a6bb46f053afe4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.NeeditLeadTimeSet</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Set Lead Time to set when needed date based on Request type hr, facility, legal</description><name>NeeditLeadTimeSet</name><script><![CDATA[function NeeditLeadTimeSet(request_type)
{
	var today = new GlideDateTime();
		
        var leadedtime;
        if (request_type == 'hr') {
            today.addDaysLocalTime(3);
            //leadedtime = today.getDisplayValue();
            return today;
        } else if (request_type == 'legal') {
            today.addDaysLocalTime(5);
            //leadedtime = today.getDisplayValue();
            return today;
        } else if (request_type == 'facilities') {
            today.addDaysLocalTime(1);
            //leadedtime = today.getDisplayValue();
            return today;
        } else {
            return 'nothing';
        }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-09 08:41:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>11c86a589761211081a6bb46f053afe4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeeditLeadTimeSet</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_11c86a589761211081a6bb46f053afe4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-15 05:07:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
